accessibility_onboarding.enable_narrator: Press enter to enable the narrator
accessibility_onboarding.title:
Welcome to Minecraft!

Would you like to enable the Narrator or visit the Accessibility Settings?
error.mellowui.broken_config_screen: There was a critical issue trying to load the config screen for '%s'

menu.mellowui.out_of_memory.title: Minecraft has run out of memory!
menu.mellowui.out_of_memory.message:
This could be caused by a bug in the game or by the Java Virtual Machine not being allocated enough memory.

To prevent world corruption, the current game has quit. We've tried to free up enough memory to let you go back to the main menu and back to playing, but this may not have worked.

Please restart the game if you see this message again.
menu.mellowui.mods.title: Mods (%s)
menu.mellomedley.title: Mellomedley Title Screen
menu.forge.options.title: [Forge] Options
menu.forge.client_options.title: [Forge] Options > Client Options
menu.forge.server_options.title: [Forge] Options > Server Options
config.mellowui.main_menu_mod_button.des:
Where the 'Mods' button should be located in the main menu.
%s
config.mellowui.main_menu_mod_button.opt: §lAdjacent§r: Places the mods button besides Realms as a button with text.
§lIcon§r: Places the mods button besides Realms as an icon button, like accessibility.
§lReplace Realms§r: Replaces Realms with the mods button, as Realms doesn't work with Forge or in older versions.
config.mellowui.pause_menu_mod_button.de:
Where the 'Mods' button should be located in the pause menu.
%s
config.mellowui.pause_menu_mod_button.op: §lReplace§r: Replaces the 'Give Feedback' and 'Report Bugs' buttons in the pause menu.
§lIcon§r: Places the mods button besides 'Report Bugs' as an icon button.
config.mellowui.legacy_button_colors.des: Makes the text in buttons slightly darker, and when hovered the text will have a slight yellow tint.
config.mellowui.panorama_bobbing.desc: Whether the panorama should bob up and down instead of being at a consistent pitch.
config.mellowui.panorama_camera_pitch.de: The pitch of the panorama camera. Defaults to 10º.
config.mellowui.monochrome_loading_scree:
§lMonochrome Loading Screen Color§r:
Changes the color of the loading screen to this color when the 'Monochrome Loading Screen' option is enabled.
config.mellowui.splash_text_color.desc:
§lSplash Text Color§r:
Determined which color is used for the splash text.
config.mellowui.main_menu_style.desc:
The style to use for the main menu.
§eThis is recommended to be turned off if FancyMenu is loaded, as most modpacks update the main menu using the mod.
config.mellowui.updated_pack_menu.desc:
The style to use for the resource and data pack menus.
Completely overhauls the menu by unifying the lists and updating the pack selection.
config.mellowui.updated_pause_menu.desc:
The style to use for the pause menu.
Centralizes all buttons and adds the 'Mods' button.
config.mellowui.updated_options_menu.des:
The style to use for the options menu.
Adds new buttons and moves the 'Done' button down.
config.mellowui.updated_skin_customizati:
The style to use for the skin customization menu.
Replaces the buttons with a list, like in other screens.
config.mellowui.updated_music_and_sounds:
The style to use for the music and sounds menu.
Replaces the buttons with a list and adds options from newer versions.
config.mellowui.updated_controls_menu.de:
The style to use for the controls menu.
Makes it a subcategory of a new screen, which includes various other options.
config.mellowui.updated_accessibility_me:
The style to use for the accessibility settings menu.
Makes the title height consistent and reorganizes the button layouts.
config.mellowui.updated_out_of_memory_me:
The style to use for the out of memory menu.
Makes the screen resemble Windows' BSOD.
config.mellowui.updated_screen_backgroun: Updates the background of all screens for a transparent background, resembling the new UI introduced in 1.20.5.
Updates the background of all lists (like video settings or languages) for a transparent background, resembling the new UI introduced in 1.20.5.
config.mellowui.mod_list_style.desc:
The style to use for Forge's mod list menu.
Mellow UI's completely overhauls it by making the panel larger and more readable, and having better button arrangement.
config.mellowui.replace_realms_notificat: Replaces the 'Realms Notifications' button in the options screen with the online options button from newer versions.
config.mellowui.logo_style.desc: Style to use for the Minecraft logo. Includes the current logo (1.16), new logo (1.20+), and the Mellomedley logo.
config.mellowui.splash_text_position.des: Where the splash texts should be located in the main menu.
config.mellowui.scrolling_text.desc: Makes the text in buttons scroll if it's too long instead of rendering on top of other widgets.
config.mellowui.background_shaders.desc:
Whether shaders, like super secret settings and the blur, should render on the panorama.
§aThis may fix rendering issues in menus added by other mods.
config.mellowui.blurry_containers.desc: If the background blur and shaders should be applied on containers like chests, furnaces and your inventory.
config.mellowui.disable_branding.desc: Disables Forge's branding lines. Branding lines are the Forge and MCP versions on the bottom-left corner.
config.mellomedley.splash_text_color.des:
§lSplash Text Color§r:
Determined which color is used for the splash text.
Where the 'Mods' button should be located on Mellomedley's main menu.
%s
§lIcon§r: Places the 'Mods' button as an icon button between accessibility and language in the footer.
§lBelow Options§r: Places the 'Mods' button below the 'Options' button, moving all other buttons down.
config.minecraft.realms_notifications.de: Fetches Realms news and invites in the title screen and displays their respective icon on the Realms button.
config.minecraft.monochrome_loading_scre: Changes the Mojang Studios loading screen background color to, by default, black.
config.minecraft.menu_background_blurrin: Changes the blurriness of menu backgrounds.
config.minecraft.hide_splash_texts.desc: Hides the yellow splash text in the main menu.
config.minecraft.show_music_toast.desc: Displays a toast whenever a song starts playing. The same toast is constantly displayed in the in-game pause menu while a song is playing.
config.minecraft.high_contrast.desc: Enhances the contrast of UI elements.
config.minecraft.high_contrast.not_avail: High Contrast resource pack is not available.
config.minecraft.directional_audio.on_de: Uses HRTF-based directional audio to improve the simulation of 3D sound. Requires HRTF compatible audio hardware, and is best experienced with headphones.
config.forge.server_settings.only_in_wor: Server settings should only be configured while in a world!
config.forge.remove_erroring_entities.de:
Removes any entities that throw an error in their update() method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log.
§c§lWARNING§r§c: Use sparingly, as this can screw up everything. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES!
config.forge.remove_erroring_block_entit:
Removes any block entities that throw an error in their update() method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log.
§c§lWARNING§r§c: Use sparingly, as this can screw up everything. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES!
config.forge.full_bounding_box_ladders.d:
Makes entities check their whole bounding box for ladders instead of only the block they're in.
Causes noticeable differences in mechanics.
config.forge.fix_advancement_loading.des: Fixes advancement loading to use a proper topological sort. This may have visibility side effects and can be turned off if needed for data pack compatibility.
config.forge.base_zombie_summon_chance.d: Base zombie summoning spawn chance. Allows changing the bonus zombie summoning mechanic.
config.forge.baby_zombie_chance.desc: Chance that a zombie (or subtype) is a baby. Allows changing the zombie spawning mechanic.
config.forge.log_cascading_world_generat: Log cascading chunk generation issues during terrain population.
config.forge.fix_vanilla_cascading.desc:
Fix vanilla issues that cause world generation cascading.
§c§lWARNING§r§c: This changes vanilla world generation, so don't report world generation related issues if this setting is on.
config.forge.dimension_unload_queue_dela: The time in ticks the server will wait when a dimension was queued to unload. This can be useful when rapidly loading and unloading dimensions, like throwing items through a Nether portal a few times per second.
config.forge.treat_empty_tags_as_air.des:
Vanilla treats crafting recipes using empty tags as air, and allows you to craft with nothing in that slot.
This changes empty tags to use barriers as the item to prevent crafting with air.
config.forge.zoom_missing_text_in_guis: Zoom In Missing Model Text in GUIs
config.forge.zoom_missing_text_in_guis.d: Turn off to make missing model text in GUIs fit inside the slot.
config.forge.gpu_cloud_rendering.desc: Upload cloud geometry to the GPU for faster cloud rendering.
Disables culling hidden faces next to stairs and slabs. Causes extra rendering, but may fix some resource packs that exploit this vanilla mechanic.
config.forge.threaded_chunk_rendering.de:
Enables Forge to queue all chunk updates to the 'Chunk Update' thread.
May increase FPS significantly, but may also cause weird rendering lag.
§cNot recommended for computers without a significant number of cores available.
config.forge.forge_light_pipeline.desc: Enables Forge's block rendering pipeline, which fixes the lighting of custom models.
config.forge.experimental_light_pipeline: Enables an experimental version of Forge's block rendering pipeline, which fixes the lighting of custom models.
Makes specific reload tasks such as changing languages quicker to run.
config.forge.use_combined_depth_stencil_: Use a combined depth stencil attachment instead of two separate ones.
config.forge.show_load_warnings.desc: Shows any warnings that occurred during loading.
